main event: A bright green light was observed in the air over Yellow Springs, Ohio, on January 22, 1966, for about 3 to 6 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared like a green traffic light viewed through mist., It made no sound as it moved and gradually disappeared., The observer estimated the object was approximately 7-8 miles away and moving at about 105 MPH., The witness reported the object moving behind a cloud during the sighting., No physical evidence was collected from the sighting.
